abstract: Chris Carpenter, the Cardinals' Game 2 starter, and Roy Halladay, the Phillies' Game 1 starter, worked together to improve their focus during their days in Toronto.
snippet: Chris Carpenter, the Cardinals' Game 2 starter, and Roy Halladay, the Phillies' Game 1 starter, worked together to improve their focus during their days in Toronto.

headline.main: Carpenter Works to Keep Distractions at Bay
